title: Gronk Interview, JLC Season Predictions (Football 09/05)
description:
Will Brinson and Nick Kostos take a look at some of the news around the NFL, including Brock Osweiler signing with the Broncos (3:30) and the status of Ezekiel Elliott's lawsuit against the NFL (6:50). Then they welcome on Patriots tight end Rob Gronkowski to break down New England's season and debate the handsomeness of Tom Brady and Jimmy Garoppolo (14;50-27:00), before bringing on CBS Sports NFL Insider Jason LaCanfora to explain why he thinks the Seahawks will win the Super Bowl (33:40), why the Broncos will win the AFC West and why the Giants will win the NFC East (46:30).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
